titleInfo.title: Touch perception and emotional appraisal for a virtual agent

name.namePart: Workshop at the 30th Annual German Conference on Artificial Intelligence (KI 2007): Emotion and Computing

mods.abstract: Building virtual agents that are able to perceive and appraise touch increase the lifelikeness and interaction possibilities in human computer interaction. In this paper we introduce work on how a sense of touch was realized for the virtual human Max and how he can emotionally react to it by appraising the different kinds of tactile sensation.
